page.title: 09Cottingham High School.
page.content: When I am 11 I will leave this school and go to Cottingham High School. We do not call it this, it is usually known as Harland Way because that is where it is. It is a very big school compared to ours. It has 1600 students. It was opened in 1955. It was not always a school, it used to be a big house and when my group looked round it we saw some of the old garden walls. Many of the trees in the grounds were planted when the school was an old house. Our guide, a teacher at the school, said you could tell the history of the school by the trees. The teacher also told us about the school's ghost. It seems that when the school was being built an electrician was killed under the stage. He tries to escape by opening one of the stage doors without being seen.
